attributes.action: Stop all MP expenses: MP's hostel in central London for MP's from distant constituencies
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
2nd home expenses? Light bulbs? dog food? Horse manure?
While I sympathise with MP's whose constituencies are a long way from their place of business, the expenses claims are simply ridiculous.  Why not create a hostel for distant MP's and put an end to these crazy 2nd home expenses

rejection.details: MPs' expenses are a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
